content.question: Using the excerpts, respond to parts a, b, and c. Briefly describe one major difference between Sanders’ and Neverdon-Morton’s interpretations of reform movements from 1890 to 1920. Briefly explain how one specific event or development from 1890 to 1920 not explicitly mentioned in the excerpts could be used to support Sanders’ interpretation. Briefly explain how one specific event or development from 1890 to 1920 not explicitly mentioned in the excerpts could be used to support Neverdon-Morton’s interpretation.

frqParts.text: Using the excerpts, respond to parts a, b, and c. Briefly describe one major difference between Sanders’ and Neverdon-Morton’s interpretations of reform movements from 1890 to 1920. skill.text: Skill 3.C: Compare the arguments or main ideas of two sources.
